info.name: FitConnet - APIREST
info.description: Contains all the CRUD methods for different entities: user, activity, and notifications.

item.name: ADMIN
GET METHODS

request.description: Retrieves data for the admin dashboard, including user information and activities.

item.description: This folder contains all HTTP requests that follow the GET protocol.

item.name: UPDATE METHODS

request.description: Updates an existing user with new information.
Updates an existing notification with new information.
Updates an existing activity with new information.

item.description: This folder contains all HTTP requests that follow the UPDATE protocol.

item.name: DELETE METHODS

request.description: Deletes a user by his id.
Deletes an activity.

item.description: This folder contains all HTTP requests that follow the DELETE protocol.
Contains methods that only administrators can access.

item.name: ACTIVITY

request.description: Registers a new activity in the system.
Retrieves a set of activities created by the user.

response.name: Activities retrieved successfully

request.description: Retrieves activities associated with a specific user.

response.name: Activities retrieved successfully

request.description: Retrieves a set of activities in which the user has participated.

response.name: Activities retrieved successfully

request.description: Retrieves all activities registered in the system.

response.name: Activities retrieved successfully

request.description: Retrieves an activity by its ID.

response.name: Activity retrieved successfully

request.description: Replaces an existing activity with another.
Updates some of the attributes of an activity.
A user can delete an activity only if they are the creator of it.

item.description: In this section we find all HTTP requests: create, read, update and delete for an activity.

request.description: Registers a new user in the system.
Registers a new admin user in the system.
Retrieves a user by ID.

response.name: User retrieved successfully

request.description: Retrieves all users registered in the system.

response.name: Users retrieved successfully

request.description: Retrieves friends of a user by ID.

response.name: Friends retrieved successfully

request.description: Updates an existing user with new information.
Deletes a user.
Registers a new notification in the system.
Retrieves notifications associated with a specific user.

response.name: Notifications retrieved successfully

request.description: Retrieves all notifications registered in the system.

response.name: Notifications retrieved successfully

request.description: Updates an existing notification with new information.
Deletes an existing notification.
Registers a new user.
Logs in an existing user.
